name: Hieratic Seal From the Ashes
text: Once per turn, during your opponent's turn: You can send 1 "Hieratic" monster from your Deck to your Graveyard. Once per turn, during your turn: You can target 1 of your banished "Hieratic" monsters; return that target to the Graveyard. When this face-up card on the field is sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 "Hieratic" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.
